textBeforeTable: Flat view Next unread Next Previous First Parent Forum Complain Reply   Reply with quote   design guy I'd rather B&H be truthful about their poorer practices, than honest about their better ones. Most people can figure the good ones out for themselves. JMO. Stupidity aside, the scope of "honesty" restrained by such criteria, can only be selective in nature. Stupidity is being honest about your better practices, but less than truthful about your poorer ones ... and then getting caught. b) he's most interested interceding in areas where he can control damage or manage expectations in favor of -- hide signature --
